Going back towards the base, the 'roughly' two breems was seeming to be ext=
ended by another half or so as Wheelie transformed back the rest of the way=
 as he appraoched the large transport to walk towards it quietly, once he w=
as within the perimeter.

His transponder told him that LEO PRIME seemed to=
 be in some sort of strategy meeting, so he didn't expect he would be seen =
right away if he returned.

At this point, turning in the direction of wher=
e the shuttle bearing the MAXIMAL ELDER had come down that he had been upon=
, he could only wonder if he would be going back on it, they would dump him=
 here, or they would dump him elsewhere.

Walking slowly back towards the l=
arge landed ARK.
